items.title: Watch the PEOPLE WE MEET ON VACATION Teaser Trailer
items.description: Netflix has just released a teaser trailer for the adaptation of People We Meet on Vacation by Emily Henry. Watch it here!

items.title: Kamala Harris’ 107 DAYS on Pace to Be Best-Selling Memoir of 2025
Book Riot’s Deals of the Day for September 30, 2025
items.description: Suffragette witches in the 1800s, the blackmail of a part-time serial killer, guncle duty in Italy, and more of today's best book deals

items.title: Texas School Administrators Use A.I. To Ban Books Like TO KILL A MOCKINGBIRD
items.description: Leander Independent School District's administrators tell educators to "pause" use of 40 books, including numerous classroom classics.

items.title: Books to Read With Your Book Club for Latine History Month and Beyond
items.description: There's a genre-bending tale set in Havana and Cambridge, a darkly funny memoir-in-essays, and even a fun rom-com.
